title: Episode 120: Bad Behavior and Levitical Atonement with Camerin Courtney!
description: Journalist/blogger Camerin Courtney joins Phil and Skye on the podcast to talk about men behaving badly in the NFL and on college campuses, plus an app that brings levitical atonement to a smartphone near you!
